chunks.heading: Cannasol Functionality Reports — Repository Release Standard
EXACTLY What Will NOT Be Implemented
File Header Standards for different File Types that an Axovia AI Agent might work with

notes: Use Mocktail for dependency mocking; do not mock widgets/rendering

documents.frontmatter:
id: flutter-testing-standard
version: 1.1.0
project_type: flutter
coverage:
  unit: 85
  widget: 70
  overall: 80
mocking:
  unit: allow
  widget: allow_deps_only
  integration: forbid
  golden: forbid
make_targets:
  - test-unit
  - test-widget
  - test-golden
  - test-integration
notes:
  - Use Mocktail for dependency mocking; do not mock widgets/rendering
updated_at: "${DATE:-2025-09-10}"

chunks.heading: - Mocking: Allowed for external dependencies via Mocktail; do not mock widgets
- Executes all Flutter test types in sequence
- Equivalent to: make test-unit && make test-widget && make test-integration
Software Testing Official Organization-Wide Standards of Procedures
- Executes all test stages in sequence
- Equivalent to: make test-unit && make test-integration && make test-e2e
When to Create an Implementation Plan
How to Create and Use an Implementation Plan
Widget Testing (dependency mocking allowed; do not mock widgets)
- Coverage output is written to coverage/lcov.info when --coverage is used.
- Mocking policy: allowed in unit and widget tests for external deps (Mocktail); never mock widgets or rendering.
- Adjust *_DIR variables if your project structure differs.
E) Story Decomposition for Parallel Work
- Executes all test types based on hardware availability
- HIL tests only run when hardware detected
- Falls back to emulation when hardware unavailable
- Mocking: Minimize to external services only
- Executes: npx cypress run or npx playwright test
- Executes all React test types in sequence
- Equivalent to: make test-unit && make test-component && make test-integration
